feed.title: glazeruns TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: Cocodona 250 miler ✅️ What did I win? This fancy belt buckle. 4th year in a row with no support or crew. Just out there figuring it out by myself. #cocodona250 #runtok #ultramarathon
entry.content: Cocodona 250 miler ✅️ What did I win? This fancy belt buckle. 4th year in a row with no support or crew. Just out there figuring it out by myself. #cocodona250 #runtok #ultramarathon

entry.title: I think I lost 15 pounds in 4 days and took 600,000 steps. What an adventure. #cocodona250 #runtok #ultramarathon
entry.content: I think I lost 15 pounds in 4 days and took 600,000 steps. What an adventure. #cocodona250 #runtok #ultramarathon

entry.title: These were brand new before the race. Only wore this one pair for the entire 250 miles. Although i did change my socks 10 times. Cocodona 250 is a very rocky technical course, and despite that, they held up well. I lost a little rubber on the back right o
entry.content: These were brand new before the race. Only wore this one pair for the entire 250 miles. Although i did change my socks 10 times. Cocodona 250 is a very rocky technical course, and despite that, they held up well. I lost a little rubber on the back right o

entry.title: 280 miles = 450 km This next week is going to be hard. #runtok #runstreak#ultrarunner
entry.content: 280 miles = 450 km This next week is going to be hard. #runtok #runstreak#ultrarunner

entry.title: Well at least I'm certified! I've heard that's a hard certification to obtain. Remember you'll never meet a hater doing more than you. #runtok #runstreak #ultrarunner
entry.content: Well at least I'm certified! I've heard that's a hard certification to obtain. Remember you'll never meet a hater doing more than you. #runtok #runstreak #ultrarunner

entry.title: 10 times during the race, I cleaned my feet and put on new socks. I also re taped any toes where the tape came off. I did get more blisters than normal, but I think that due to the technicality of the trail. Same shoes all 250 miles. Not bad, eh? Smile, o
entry.content: 10 times during the race, I cleaned my feet and put on new socks. I also re taped any toes where the tape came off. I did get more blisters than normal, but I think that due to the technicality of the trail. Same shoes all 250 miles. Not bad, eh? Smile, o

entry.title: 13 pounds is heavy when running 250 miles. Luckily, during the night, I was wearing a lot of that gear on my body. But the water and the food were a constant weight. If you have questions, let me know. Everything worked quite well, I didn't have any l ep
entry.content: 13 pounds is heavy when running 250 miles. Luckily, during the night, I was wearing a lot of that gear on my body. But the water and the food were a constant weight. If you have questions, let me know. Everything worked quite well, I didn't have any l ep

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
